title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 723.7 - Telephone out of order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 723.7 - Telephone out of order

State Regulations

When a facility telephone which can be utilized by inmates in
accordance with this Part is out of service, the superintendent shall so advise
management information services, and indicate if the outage is due to inmate
damage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
723.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
